an5.170:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anando kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
an5.170:1.2: Atha kho ayasma bhaddaji yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata anandena saddhim sammodi.
an5.170:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam bhaddajim ayasma anando etadavoca:
an5.170:1.4: “kim nu kho, avuso bhaddaji, dassananam aggam, kim savananam aggam, kim sukhanam aggam, kim sannanam aggam, kim bhavanam aggan”ti?
an5.170:2.1: “Atthavuso, brahma abhibhu anabhibhuto annadatthudaso vasavatti, yo tam brahmanam passati, idam dassananam aggam.
an5.170:2.2: Atthavuso, abhassara nama deva sukhena abhisanna parisanna.
an5.170:2.5: Yo tam saddam sunati, idam savananam aggam.
an5.170:2.7: Te santamyeva tusita sukham pativedenti, idam sukhanam aggam.
an5.170:2.8: Atthavuso, akincannayatanupaga deva, idam sannanam aggam.
an5.170:2.9: Atthavuso, nevasannanasannayatanupaga deva, idam bhavanam aggan”ti.
an5.170:2.10: “Sameti kho idam ayasmato bhaddajissa, yadidam bahuna janena”ti?
an5.170:3.3: “Tenahavuso bhaddaji, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
an5.170:3.4: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma bhaddaji ayasmato anandassa paccassosi.
an5.170:4.1: “Yatha passato kho, avuso, anantara asavanam khayo hoti, idam dassananam aggam.
an5.170:4.2: Yatha sunato anantara asavanam khayo hoti, idam savananam aggam.
an5.170:4.3: Yatha sukhitassa anantara asavanam khayo hoti, idam sukhanam aggam.
an5.170:4.4: Yatha sannissa anantara asavanam khayo hoti, idam sannanam aggam.
an5.170:4.5: Yatha bhutassa anantara asavanam khayo hoti, idam bhavanam aggan”ti.
